Module: Storage

The Storage module manages client-side data storage.

This module contains the following classes:

  • Storage
  • StorageEngineGears
  • StorageEngineHTML5
  • StorageEngineKeyed
  • StorageEngineSWF
  • StorageEvent
  • StorageManager
